caption.p: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) images of the electrospun fibers of poly(3-hydroxybutyrate- co-3-hydroxyvalerate) (PHBV)/Mobil Composition of Matter (MCM)-41 with eugenol: ( a) Neat PHBV; ( b) 2.5 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( c) 5 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( d) 7.5 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( e) 10 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( f) 15 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( g) 20 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol. Scale markers of 10 Âµm.
